org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.domain
Class TickFormatterFactory

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
DateTickFormatterFactory, IntTickFormatterFactory
public abstract class TickFormatterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

Factory for obtaining a suitable TickFormatter object for a given domain span.

Author:
chad takahashi

Method Detail

createRootTickFormatter

protected abstract TickFormatter createRootTickFormatter()

getAffinityFactor

protected double getAffinityFactor()
A value in the range (0.0, 1.0], which determines how readily the findBestFormatter(double) algorithm will "jump down to" the next sub-formatter. The larger the factor, the more "affinity" the algorithm will have for the current formatter.

findBestFormatter

public final TickFormatter findBestFormatter(double domainWidth)
Finds the smallest-scale TickFormatter that engulfs the specified domain interval.

getRootFormatter

public final TickFormatter getRootFormatter()
